title: iRISC
para1: iRISC (interactive reduced instruction-set computer) is a web application which allows users to write simple ARMv7 assembly language programs and interactively see the results of running their code on a simulated set of CPU registers and memory.
para2: The web version of iRISC is still under active development and is in an incomplete state; however a more feature complete desktop version is available if you can be bothered to compile the C++ binaries.
